testcase.name: Wait for command status update (SENT or ACCEPTED)
Check command status in DB (wait for SENT or ACCEPTED)
Assert command status is SENT or ACCEPTED
Wait for command acceptance (ACCEPTED) if not already
Check command status is ACCEPTED or DONE (if ACCEPTED not received, skip to DONE)

failure.message: Timeout waiting for DB condition: SELECT status FROM commands WHERE cmd_id = :cmd_id AND status IN ('ACCEPTED', 'DONE', 'ACK')

testcase.failure: Timeout waiting for DB condition: SELECT status FROM commands WHERE cmd_id = :cmd_id AND status IN ('ACCEPTED', 'DONE', 'ACK')
